docs.lead_paragraph: Representative Todd Akin’s comments are a gift to liberals, but only if they don’t overreach.
docs.abstract: Ross Douthat Op-Ed column contends that Rep Todd Akin's comments about rape and abortion are a gift to the Democratic Party and abortion rights activists, but warns that if they attempt to link Mitt Romney to those comments they will overplay their advantage.
docs.snippet: Representative Todd Akin’s comments are a gift to liberals, but only if they don’t overreach.

docs.lead_paragraph: A high-profile study concluded that increased mutations found in the sperm of older men meant that they were more likely than their younger counterparts to father children with autism or schizophrenia.

headline.seo: Autism Study Starts Clock for Prospective Fathers
headline.main: The Clock Ticks for Men as Well
headline.print_headline: The Clock Ticks For Men as Well

docs.abstract: Motherlode blog on study in journal Nature that finds that older men are more likely to father children with autism or schizophrenia than are their younger counterparts; questions whether obstetricians will begin warning men of potential risks associated with their biological clocks the way they do with women.
docs.snippet: A high-profile study concluded that increased mutations found in the sperm of older men meant that they were more likely than their younger counterparts to father children with autism or schizophrenia.

docs.lead_paragraph: Hanna Rosin on women’s success in college.
docs.snippet: Hanna Rosin on women’s success in college.

headline.main: Will Men Really Worry About Their Biological Clocks?

docs.abstract: Will men remain cavalier about research showing that older men are more likely to father children with autism than their younger counterparts, or will the conversation change?
docs.snippet: Will men remain cavalier about research showing that older men are more likely to father children with autism than their younger counterparts, or will the conversation change?

headline.main: Gestation Crate Denial in New Jersey

docs.abstract: The president of the New Jersey Farm Bureau does not think gestation crates are inhumane.
docs.snippet: The president of the New Jersey Farm Bureau does not think gestation crates are inhumane.

headline.main: Still Running, Akin Meets With Conservatives

docs.abstract: Representative Todd Akin appeared before the Council on National Policy in Tampa, Fla., in an apparent effort to drum up support within the G.O.P.'s right wing as he faces calls to drop his Senate bid.
docs.snippet: Representative Todd Akin appeared before the Council on National Policy in Tampa, Fla., in an apparent effort to drum up support within the G.O.P.'s right wing as he faces calls to drop his Senate bid.

docs.lead_paragraph: Illegal immigrants in the Rio Grande Valley who are seeking abortions after 16 weeks’ gestation are often deterred by the long drive to a surgical center and internal border checkpoints.

headline.seo: Texas ‘Border’ Checkpoints Deter Noncitizens Seeking Second-Trimester Abortions
headline.main: ‘Border’ Checkpoints Deter Noncitizens Seeking Later Abortions
headline.print_headline: ‘Border’ Checkpoints Deter Noncitizens Seeking Later Abortions

docs.snippet: Illegal immigrants in the Rio Grande Valley who are seeking abortions after 16 weeks’ gestation are often deterred by the long drive to a surgical center and internal border checkpoints.

docs.lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. has redefined the crime of rape and is studying how to improve the way it collects data on sexual assaults.

headline.seo: Definition of Rape Is Shifting Rapidly
headline.main: A Candidate’s Stumble on a Distressing Crime
headline.print_headline: A Candidate’s Stumble On a Distressing Crime

docs.abstract: Rapidly shifting definition of rape is embedded, if unexamined, in the furor over comments by Rep Todd Akin of Missouri about rape and abortion; the Federal Bureau of Investigation has redefined the crime of rape and is studying how to improve the way it collects data on sexual assaults.
docs.snippet: The F.B.I. has redefined the crime of rape and is studying how to improve the way it collects data on sexual assaults.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican officials are crossing fingers that “Mitt Romney for President” placards will not have to be used as hurricane shutters at their convention in Tampa.

headline.seo: Republicans in Tampa Prepare for Tropical Storm Isaac
headline.main: Preparing in Tampa for a Convention That Might Become a Hurricane Party
headline.print_headline: Preparing in Tampa for a Convention That Might Become a Hurricane Party

docs.abstract: Republican Party officials are crossing their fingers that Tropical Storm Isaac will not disrupt the Republican National Convention in Tampa, Fla, but are making contingency plans anyway.
docs.snippet: Republican officials are crossing fingers that “Mitt Romney for President” placards will not have to be used as hurricane shutters at their convention in Tampa.

docs.lead_paragraph: The beliefs about pregnancy held by Representative Todd Akin are obviously at odds with modern science. However, they are in step with medieval science.

headline.main: The Medieval Roots of Todd Akin’s Theories
headline.print_headline: The Medieval Roots of Todd Akin’s Theories
